analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: GMS at 39 marks a Defensive regime. Downward momentum pushed the score to 39 as flat retail sales and a rising VIX (Fear/Volatility) at 17.46 signal macro exhaustion. While DXY (Dollar strength/Liquidity) remains stable, extreme fear in crypto indicates deep caution. However, resilient Net Liquidity and tight credit spreads suggest a systemic floor despite the cooling economy. Focus on capital preservation as support levels are tested.

reports.EN: GMS at 39 marks a Defensive regime. Downward momentum pushed the score to 39 as flat retail sales and a rising VIX (Fear/Volatility) at 17.46 signal macro exhaustion. While DXY (Dollar strength/Liquidity) remains stable, extreme fear in crypto indicates deep caution. However, resilient Net Liquidity and tight credit spreads suggest a systemic floor despite the cooling economy. Focus on capital preservation as support levels are tested.
reports.ES: El GMS en 39 indica un rÃ©gimen Defensivo. El momentum bajista empujÃ³ el puntaje a 39 debido a las ventas minoristas planas y al aumento del VIX (Miedo/Volatilidad) a 17.46, reflejando el agotamiento macro. Aunque el DXY (DÃ³lar/Liquidez) se mantiene estable, el sentimiento cripto en miedo extremo confirma la aversiÃ³n al riesgo. Sin embargo, la liquidez neta estable y los diferenciales de crÃ©dito sugieren un soporte que podrÃ­a evitar un colapso total. Se recomienda precauciÃ³n extrema y priorizar la preservaciÃ³n de capital ahora.

reports.ID: Skor GMS 39 menandakan rezim Defensif. Momentum menurun mendorong skor ke 39 seiring penjualan ritel yang datar dan kenaikan VIX (Ketakutan/Volatilidad) ke 17,46 yang mencerminkan kelelahan makro. Meskipun DXY (Kekuatan Dolar) stabil, ketakutan ekstrem di pasar kripto menunjukkan penghindaran risiko yang mendalam. Namun, likuiditas bersih yang stabil dan penyempitan spread kredit dapat menjadi dasar sistemik yang mencegah keruntuhan lebih lanjut. Fokus pada perlindungan modal saat pasar menguji level dukungan teknis saat ini.

reports.DE: Der GMS-Score von 39 signalisiert ein defensives Regime. AbwÃ¤rtsmomentum drÃ¼ckte den Score auf 39, da stagnierende EinzelhandelsumsÃ¤tze und ein steigender VIX (Angst/VolatilitÃ¤t) bei 17,46 die Makro-ErschÃ¶pfung verdeutlichen. WÃ¤hrend der DXY (DollarstÃ¤rke) stabil bleibt, zeigt die extreme Angst im Kryptosektor eine starke Risikoscheu. Dennoch kÃ¶nnten die stabile NettoliquiditÃ¤t und enge Kredit-Spreads einen systemischen Boden bilden. Fokus auf Kapitalschutz, wÃ¤hrend die MÃ¤rkte ihre UnterstÃ¼tzungsebenen testen. Vorsicht bleibt das oberste Gebot.
reports.FR: Le score GMS Ã  39 signale un rÃ©gime DÃ©fensif. L'Ã©lan baissier a poussÃ© le score Ã  39, reflÃ©tant des ventes au dÃ©tail stagnantes et une hausse du VIX (Peur/VolatilitÃ©) Ã  17,46. Bien que le DXY (Force du dollar) soit stable, la peur extrÃªme sur les cryptos souligne une forte aversion au risque. Cependant, la rÃ©silience de la liquiditÃ© nette et le resserrement des spreads de crÃ©dit pourraient offrir un plancher systÃ©mique malgrÃ© le refroidissement Ã©conomique. PrioritÃ© Ã  la prÃ©servation du capital alors que les supports sont testÃ©s.
